Package com.nlivingstone

Class AuctionHouseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nlivingstone.AuctionHouseClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class AuctionHouseClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is to represent the client side of the auction house which connects to the bank.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Attempts to connect to the bank and maintains a read/write channel with it as well.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getClientSocket

        public java.net.Socket getClientSocket()

      • requestFundBlock

        public int requestFundBlock​(org.json.simple.JSONObject requestData)
        Requests the bank server to block specified number of funds in an account based on given ID. Response Codes: (1) Enough funds are available to be blocked and were successfully blocked (0) Not enough funds available to be blocked (-1) Error occurred during block request
        Parameters:
        requestData - JSONObject of account ID to and amount to block
        Returns:
        Block Request Status Code

      • requestUnblockFunds

        public int requestUnblockFunds​(org.json.simple.JSONObject requestData)
        Requests to unblock funds for bidder. Should be called when an agent id outbid.
        Parameters:
        requestData - JSONObject Contains amount to unblock and accountID
        Returns:
        (1) on success (0) unavailable funds to unblock (-1) communication failure with bank

      • shutdownClient

        public void shutdownClient()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
